CmdLine:
rpm --import https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/RPM-GPG-KEY-EPEL-7;rpm -Uvh https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-7.noarch.rpm; rpm --import http://packages.elastic.co/GPG-KEY-elasticsearch; rpm --import https://artifacts.elastic.co/GPG-KEY-elasticsearch; yum -y install  java-1.8.0-openjdk;export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/jre-openjdk;echo $'[kibana-5.x]
name=Kibana repository for 5.x packages
baseurl=https://artifacts.elastic.co/packages/5.x/yum
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://artifacts.elastic.co/GPG-KEY-elasticsearch
enabled=1
autorefresh=1
type=rpm-md
' | tee /etc/yum.repos.d/kibana.repo; yum install -y kibana && yum clean all && sed -i 's/# server.host: "0.0.0.0"/server.host: "localhost"/g' /etc/kibana/kibana.yml && groupadd -r docker && useradd -r -g docker docker
Commands.Name: run
